lead_paragraph:
LEVINE--Jacques.

Adored father, grandfather and great grandfather, loved by his extended family and friends, Jacques will be remembered for his strength (the rock), integrity, and loyalty. He was always there for every family event and never forgot anyone's birthday with a hand written card which made us feel so important. His smile always brightened our day and we will miss him terribly. Deedy and David, Karen and Jim, Julie and Rob, Patty
